com.att.aro.videocapture

Class VideoCaptureThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.att.aro.videocapture.VideoCaptureThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class VideoCaptureThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Represents a process thread for capturing raw images from the Android Emulator. The class contains methods for initiating and ending the process of capturing raw images to create a video.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread
